titleStmt.title: An explanation of Mr. Gunter's quadrant, as it is enlarged with an analemma by Richard Holland.
titleStmt.author: Holland, R. (Richard), 1596-1677.
Gunter, Edmund, 1581-1626.
Prujean, Joh. (John), mathematical instrument maker.

notesStmt.note: "This book, with all mathematical instruments, are made and sold by John Prujean, mathematick-instrument-maker, near New College in Oxon."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
